data.title: Both Mitchell brothers ‘beaten up by real life partners’
data.meta_description: It sounds like a plot twist that even EastEnders scriptwriters would have second thoughts about: the two actors who play television’s hard-nut Mitchell brothers have both allegedly been beaten up by
data.text:
It sounds like a plot twist that even EastEnders scriptwriters would have second thoughts about: the two actors who play television’s hard-nut Mitchell brothers have both allegedly been beaten up by their real-life love interests.

The first to fall foul of his partner was Ross Kemp, who plays Grant in the long-running BBC soap. Mr Kemp suffered a cut lip after an alleged assault by his wife, Sun editor Rebekah Wade, at the couple’s home in Battersea in the early hours of this morning.

Ms Wade was held for eight hours in a South London police station this morning but returned to work at the newspaper’s offices this afternoon. Police said no further action would be taken.
